data.name: DefaultError
data.value: An unknown failure has occurred.

data.name: PasswordMismatch
data.value: Incorrect password.

data.name: InvalidToken
data.value: Invalid token.

data.name: LoginAlreadyAssociated
data.value: A user with this login already exists.

data.name: InvalidUserName
data.value: User name '{0}' is invalid, can only contain letters or digits.

data.name: InvalidEmail
data.value: Email '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: DuplicateUserName
data.value: User Name '{0}' is already taken.

data.name: DuplicateEmail
data.value: Email '{0}' is already taken.

data.name: InvalidRoleName
data.value: Role name '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: DuplicateRoleName
data.value: Role name '{0}' is already taken.

data.name: UserAlreadyHasPassword
data.value: User already has a password set.

data.name: UserLockoutNotEnabled
data.value: Lockout is not enabled for this user.

data.name: UserAlreadyInRole
data.value: User already in role '{0}'.

data.name: UserNotInRole
data.value: User is not in role '{0}'.

data.name: PasswordTooShort
data.value: Passwords must be at least '{0}' characters.

data.name: PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric
data.value: Passwords must have at least one non alphanumeric character.

data.name: PasswordRequiresDigit
data.value: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').

data.name: PasswordRequiresLower
data.value: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').

data.name: PasswordRequiresUpper
data.value: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').

data.name: Failed
data.value: Credentials is not correct.

data.name: LockedOut
data.value: To many attempts. User is locked out.

data.name: NotAllowed
data.value: Account not verified.

data.name: ConfirmationEmailSent
data.value: A message with a link to verify account has been sent to your email.

data.name: Required
data.value: Field is required.

data.name: RestoreLink
data.value: Go to link to restore your password: {0}, if you did'nt request password restore ignore this message.

data.name: Password Restore
data.value: Password reset link

data.name: PasswordResetEmailSent
data.value: A message with a link to reset your password has been sent to your email.

data.name: PasswordChanged
data.value: The password was successfully changed.

data.name: EmailConfirmed
data.value: The email address has been successfully verified.

data.name: Email is invalid or not found.
data.value: Email is invalid or not found.

data.name: ConfirmEmailLink
data.value: Follow the link to verify your email address: {0}.

data.name: Email confirmation
data.value: Email confirmation
